reviewText: Well filmed, clear, and understandable movement.

The disc came in a package case that was in very poor condition.  Some of the plastic edges fell off and scratched the dvd, which was slipping around in the case. I hope that the dvd is completely viewable.
Instead of teaching - all I have is a demonstration - I could get that on YouTube. A waste of money

There were 3 different views of each technique.  The slow motion view of the form was extremely helpful.  This helped visually understand different angles.  Video quality needs improvement.  Very good learning tool to accompany seminars or lessons learned in class.
